article_title: Last Week Wasn't Even Close To As Good As Mitch McConnell Wants You To Believe

article_metadata.description: You can’t help but be both amused and distressed by the political tripe that came out of Congress last week. I’m not referring to the legislation, although that was pretty bad all by itself. I’m talking about the self-congratulatory words and victory lap tones that were used to characterize budget-busting, [...]
article_metadata.author: Stan Collender
